body:
Hello, My name is Brokennz I'm new in this community but I joined 5 or 6 months ago. I'm user from the Overcast Network (I'm here looking for new experiences). I'm from México and I'm 15 (in October turning to 16).

So yeah, Ask Me Anything, I'll do my best to try to respond in English or even spanish.
